title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Filecoin (FIL) Gains 3.7% as Index Trades Higher
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Polygon (POL) joined Filecoin (FIL) as a top performer, also rising 3.7% from Thursday.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2464.88, up 0.4% (+10.35) since 4 p.m. ET on Friday.

Eighteen of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: FIL (+3.7%) and POL (+3.7%).

Laggards: ADA (-0.2%) and BTC (-0.2%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index is trading higher with 18 of 20 assets up, led by FIL and POL both gaining 3.7%.
